description: Transcript of Proceedings held on August 8, 2024, before Magistrate Judge Peter H. Kang. Court Reporter Ana Dub, RDR, CRR, telephone number 415-290-1651/ana_dub@cand.uscourts.gov. Per General Order No. 59 and Judicial Conference policy, this transcript may be viewed only at the Clerk's Office public terminal or may be purchased through the Court Reporter until the deadline for the Release of Transcript Restriction. After that date, it may be obtained through PACER. Any Notice of Intent to Request Redaction, if required, is due no later than 5 business days from date of this filing. description: ORDER: IT IS ORDERED, the  30  Motion to Stay and Refer is DENIED. The  39  Motion to Dismiss is DENIED. The (Docs.  50  and  51 ) Motions to Strike are DENIED AS MOOT. The  63  Motion to Strike Supplement Re: Motion to Dismiss is GRANTED. Within 14  days of the filing date of this Order, the Plaintiffs have leave to file an amended Complaint to state an alter ego claim of individual liability against Defendant Lansky. In the event, Plaintiffs do not amend the Complaint, the Defendants shall file an Answer by 6/14/24. Signed by Senior Judge Cindy K Jorgenson on 5/8/24.  (BAC)
